me anuwa rupaye udayawyya dasa aakarawe.wedana skandheyada awidyara,thrushna,karm ha sparsha aadi hethupranathya sathara nisa athiwe.ehida nibabaththi ha waya kshadanaya salakiya yuthuya.me ayurin dasa widhawu swarupayakin udaya ha waya wedana skandha yehi salakiya yuthuya.sangnya skandha yada awidyai,thrushna, karmana ha sparsha yana hethuprithyi nisa hataganiyi.ehida nibbaththi ha waya kshadhanaya salakiya yuthuya.me anuwa sangnya skandhamaye udayawyashaya balanu labe.awidyaba,thrushna,karmu ha sparsha hethuprakathyadhawimen sanskara skandhaya hataganiyi.ehida nibbaththi ha wayakshna salakiya yuthuya.mese sanskaraskandhashaye udayawyadhaya dasa ayurakin baliya yuthuya.awidya,thrushna,karma ha namarupa yana wignyanaskandhya hata ganimata hethuprasathy salakiya yuthuya.ehida nibbaththi ha waya kshathanaya baliya yuthuya.me anuwa dasawidha wu ayurin wignyanaskandhayayata widarshana kalayuthuwe.mese sama panas ayurakin udayawyamaya lakshanana salakimedi gnyanaya wadath wishadathara we.me gnyanaya tharuna widarshana gnyanaya namwe.melesa balanna aaraddha widarshakaya namwe.mese tharunawidarshana gnyanayen yuthu aaraddhawidarshakaya hata oobhasa,nyana,pithi,passaddhi,sukha,adhimokkha,paggaha,upattana,upekkha ha nikaththi yana dasha widha widarshana upaklesha hataganiyi.mehi oobhasa nam widarshana chiththayen upan sharira aalokaya we.nyana nam widarshana pra.gnyawayi.namarupa dharma pilibanda athishaya pirisidu thikshuna athiwishadawu nuwana pahalawe.pith nam widarshana prinathiyayi.passaddhi nam kaya ha chiththa passaddhiyi.kaya chiththayanhi thibu daratha durukota sahallubawak labimayi.sukha nam widarshana sukhayayi.adhimokshacha nam athishaya prusada janaka balawath shrddhawayi.paggaha nam wiryayi.upattana nam smruthiyayi.prashabala sihi nuwanak labima me namiwe.upekkha nam widarshana upekshawa ha aawarjana upeksha wa we.meya itha thiyunuya.
